task.title: Deleting a certificate profile by using the command line
task.shortdesc: System administrators can delete certificate profiles by using the delete CertificateProfile command on the command line.

context.p: You can delete a certificate profile by using the command line, or by using the . For more information about using the to delete a certificate profile, see .
context.note: You cannot delete a certificate profile that is associated with a security profile. First, delete the associated security profile, and then delete the certificate profile. For more information about deleting security profiles, see .

step.cmd: To delete a certificate profile, enter the following command:
step.info:
delete CertificateProfile "Name=name"Where:
name Specifies the name of the certificate profile that you want to delete.
